Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by Dr. Frank H. Laukien and Dr. Charles Swanton, Co-Chairs of the AACR Cancer Evolution Working Group. The 2023 CEWG Town Hall will be dedicated to the memory of Robert J Gillies and feature presentations from experts in cancer evolution on the theme of Integrating Evolutionary Principles into Cancer Patient Care followed by a provocative panel discussion and Q&A session. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session. Complimentary refreshments will be served.
SearchResultBody: TM01. Integrating Evolutionary Principles into Cancer Patient Care: A Cancer Evolution Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
Title: Integrating Evolutionary Principles into Cancer Patient Care: A Cancer Evolution Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
